means: 拯救( save的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His life was saved by a quarter-inch-thick bullet-proof steel screen.
sentence.Network_cn: 多亏一块1/4英寸厚的防弹钢板，他才捡了条命。

sentence.Network_en: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。

sentence.Network_en: He saved one shot when the ball hit him on the head.
sentence.Network_cn: 球砸中他的脑袋，从而让他化解了一次射门。

PerfectNetExp.abs: your will and determination are what saved your life ., 是你自己的意志和决心救了你的命.
You regretted not having saved half of the watermelon to bring along ., 你后悔没有省下半个瓜带着.
with your last breath you saved my soul ., 你的呼吸 , 拯救了我的灵魂.

multisim_百度百科 ... Save 保存 Save As 另存为（save as） New Project 建立新项目.

entry.def: If you save someone or something, you help them to avoid harm or to escape from a dangerous or unpleasant situation.

example.ex: ...a final attempt to save 40,000 jobs in Britain's troubled aero industry...
example.tran: 为保住陷入困境中的英国航空业的 4 万份工作所作的最后一次努力

example.ex: One man was still missing last night after the Belgian trawler Lucky capsized off the Dutch coast. Three other men were saved...
example.tran: 昨晚比利时拖网渔船“幸运号”在荷兰海岸附近沉没后，仍有1人失踪，其余 3 人被救起。

entry.def: If you save, you gradually collect money by spending less than you get, usually in order to buy something that you want.

example.ex: The majority of people intend to save, but find that by the end of the month there is nothing left...
example.tran: 大多数人都打算存钱，但月末时就会发现已一文不剩。

example.ex: Tim and Barbara are now saving for a house in the suburbs...
example.tran: 蒂姆和芭芭拉正在攒钱，准备在郊区买一栋房子。

entry.def: If you save something such as time or money, you prevent the loss or waste of it.

example.ex: It saves time in the kitchen to have things you use a lot within reach...
example.tran: 把厨房里常用的东西放在触手可及的地方能节省做饭时间。

example.ex: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles...
example.tran: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。

entry.def: If you save something, you keep it because it will be needed later.

example.ex: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup...
example.tran: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。

example.ex: Scraps of material were saved, cut up and pieced together for quilts.
example.tran: 边角碎料都保留下来，剪好后拼在一起做成被子。

entry.def: If someone or something saves you from an unpleasant action or experience, they change the situation so that you do not have to do it or experience it.

example.ex: The scanner will save risk and pain for patients...
example.tran: 扫描仪将使病人免遭风险和痛苦。

example.ex: She was hoping that something might save her from having to make a decision...
example.tran: 她希望有什么能使自己不必作决定。

entry.def: If you save data in a computer, you give the computer an instruction to store the data on a tape or disk.

example.ex: Try to get into the habit of saving your work regularly...
example.tran: 要努力养成经常将工作内容存盘的习惯。

example.ex: Import your scanned images from the scanner and save as a JPG file.
example.tran: 从扫描仪导入扫描后的图像，并保存为 JPG 文件。

entry.def: If a goalkeeper saves, or saves a shot, they succeed in preventing the ball from going into the goal.

example.ex: He saved one shot when the ball hit him on the head.
example.tran: 球砸中他的脑袋，从而让他化解了一次射门。

entry.def: You can use save to introduce the only things, people, or ideas that your main statement does not apply to.

example.ex: There is almost no water at all in Mochudi save that brought up from bore holes.
example.tran: 除了从钻孔中抽上来的水外，莫丘迪几乎滴水无存。

means.word_mean: 1. rescued; especially from the power and consequences of sin;

auth_sentence.content: He's saved every single sheep we have saved.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's saved every single sheep we have saved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's saved every single sheep we have saved.

auth_sentence.content: There is no saved-up money, says Courtney Henley.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no saved-up money, says Courtney Henley.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no saved-up money, says Courtney Henley.

auth_sentence.content: It would've saved them decades of painstaking work.
auth_sentence.res_content: It would've saved them decades of painstaking work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It would've saved them decades of painstaking work.

Sentence.sentence: Hetty saved every penny, eating in the cheapest restaurants for 15 cents.
They want to see how much they have saved.
The training saved time for the employees and money for the company.
Of course, when the markets came crashing down in 2007, it was decisive government intervention that saved the day.
If Americans saved more and spent less, consistently over time, they wouldn't have to worry about all that.
Have you saved enough money for a trip to Hawaii?
